Planned releases

  • 1.0.0 - should be released at the end of first year of development (Jan. 2018), first minimal playable version of game.
    • no sound
    • ugly graphics
    • languages en/cz
  • 0.?
    • add speed property to terrain and movable units
    • adjust path planning with terrain and unit speed
    • colonist could move to ship
    • for creating maps consider http://www.mapeditor.org
    • first manually created map containing land including basic terrains:
      • swamp
      • hill
      • mountain
      • desert
      • tundra
    • map should be stored in file
    • code formatting standard
    • on land will be two simple colonist units one owned by user second owned by AI
      • both unit will be controlled by user and AI
  • 0.3.0 - first game entity should be implemented
    • ✗ Land is added.
    • ✗ Simple map containing first land.
    • ✗ Ships can fight each others.
    • ✗ Simple AI, one ship unit controlled by AI
    • ✓ Owner of unit will be distinguish by simple flag near unit
    • ✗ Site report should contains junit test coverage
    • ✗ site report should contains measurement of javadoc quality
    • ✗ Maven site should be automatically published at github doc site
    • ✗ Maven site should be published after each travis-ci build
    • ✓ Grid could be enabled/disabled by 'g' and from preferences menu
    • ✓ Move 'm' could be accessible from menu "unit" -> "move". Menu option will be disabled when focused tile is not movable
  • 0.2.0 - first game entity should be implemented
    • ✓ first game map - just empty ocean
    • ✓ one ship controlled by user
    • ✓ both ships will move each turn
    • ✓ localization Czech/English
    • ✓ user preferences storing
    • ✓ when game is closed window will remember position and size
    • ✓ user's ship control
    • ✓ basic game domain model
    • ✓ enemy ship control

Already done

  • 0.1.0 - project setup version
    • ✓ create project infrastructure
    • ✓ create binary distribution
    • ✓ first empty form
    • ✓ write project "manifest"

Ideas

  • PoC
    • myš na hranu monitoru -> pohyb obrazovky

    • šipky -> pohyb obrazovky
    • levé tlaèítko -> výbìr jednotky
    • pravé tlaèítko -> pohyb vybrané jednotky (až po spuštìní tlaèítka, tzn. lze pøerušit)
    • levé tlaèítko myši na hrací plochu + posouvat -> pohyb obrazovky
    • výbìr jednotky myší nehýbá s obrazovkou
    • výbìr jednotky klávesnicí vycentruje obrazovku na jednotku
    • ctrl, shift nebo alt nemá žádnou funkcni
    • M pøepíná do režimu pohybu (nemusí se držet pravé tlaèítko)
    • minimapa - pouze klíkání levým tlaèítkem, nelze posouvat (nedostatek)
    • obrazovka neskáèe (centrování jednotky je plynulé)
    • koleèko zoomuje obrazovku
    • obrovské šestiúhelníky
    • ovládání je intuitivní a pøíjemné
